title: Playing With Snow
detail_text: <:th_ch0001/>It’s done~~~! Kanan-san, look!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Wow, that is a big snowman you made~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Ehehe. I figured since we’re getting so much snow, I might as well try making the biggest one around♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>That’s nice and all, but your hands are turning red. Aren’t they cold?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Ah, you’re right.... But my body is warm from moving around a bunch, so it’ll be fine!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Is that how it works....? Give me your hands for a second. Uwaah, they’re freezing! Your hands are super cold, Honoka-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Uwaaah, you’re right! I only realized how cold they were after you touched them~! What should I do? Will I get frostbite?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Let’s go somewhere warm so you won’t. Preferably somewhere with hot chocolate.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>I want hot chocolate! Some marshmallows would be perfect too. I know a good place, let’s get going~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Ah, you’re going to fall if you run that quickly! Be careful now~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
